Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal Microorganism Multiplex Nucleic Acid-Based Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for QIAGEN QIAstat-Dx GI Panel 2 Mini B multiplex nucleic acid assay for simultaneous qualitative detection of five bacteria from stool using QIAstat-Dx Analyzer 1.0
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and identification of nucleic acids from Campylobacter, Shigella, Shiga-like toxin Escherichia coli (STEC), Salmonella, and Yersinia enterocolitica in preserved stool samples from individuals with gastrointestinal infection symptoms, as an aid in diagnosis in conjunction with other data
